message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $175?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $175 is still a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to go even lower?
I'm getting closer to your target price, Bob! How about we meet at $160?
I'm getting closer to your target price, but I still think $160 is a bit high. Would you be willing to go down to $145?
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. How about we meet at $155?

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to meet you at $155, but I'll need to make a slight adjustment to my budget. How about we meet at $152?
